No logic change, just make code easier to read.
Combine 2 kinds of Exception, delete ErrorCode.
No logic change, just make code easier to read.

timeline.bodyText: this is just a style comment, but I personally find the original form of the throw (1 line versus 5 lines) easier to read.
timeline.author: joshfree

replies.bodyText:
Hi, @joshfree .
Thank you for your feedback.
Here is my principal about whether to break line:

If line length <= 120, it should be written in 1 line.
If length > 120, write 1 parameter in one line, which will make code easier to read.

In this case, I renamed method name from wrapException to toOAuth2AuthenticationException, this will make this line's length > 120, so I write each parameter in a line.
replies.author: chenrujun

timeline.message: No logic change, just make code easier to read.
